qoute: Honesty is the best policy - when there is money in it.
Honesty prospers in every condition of life.
Accuracy is the twin brother of honesty; inaccuracy of dishonesty.
Accuracy is the twin brother of honesty; inaccuracy, of dishonesty.
Art, whose honesty must work through artifice, cannot avoid cheating truth.
Commend a fool for his wit, or a rogue for his honesty and he will receive you into his favor.
Concentration is my motto - first honesty, then industry, then concentration.
For the merchant, even honesty is a financial speculation.
For them that think death's honesty won't fall upon them naturally life sometimes must get lonely.
He that fails in his endeavors after wealth or power will not long retain either honesty or courage.
Honesty and integrity are by far the most important assets of an entrepreneur.
Honesty is a good thing, but it is not profitable to its possessor unless it is kept under control.
Honesty is as rare as a man without self-pity.
Honesty is for the most par less profitable than dishonesty.
Honesty is the best policy - when there is money in it.
Honesty prospers in every condition of life.
Accuracy is the twin brother of honesty; inaccuracy of dishonesty.
Accuracy is the twin brother of honesty; inaccuracy, of dishonesty.

Concentration is my motto - first honesty, then industry, then concentration.
For the merchant, even honesty is a financial speculation.
For them that think death's honesty won't fall upon them naturally life sometimes must get lonely.
He that fails in his endeavors after wealth or power will not long retain either honesty or courage.
Honesty and integrity are by far the most important assets of an entrepreneur.
Honesty is a good thing, but it is not profitable to its possessor unless it is kept under control.
Honesty is as rare as a man without self-pity.
Honesty is for the most par less profitable than dishonesty.
Honesty is the best policy.
Honesty is the best policy. If I lose mine honor, I lose myself.
Honesty is the best policy; but he who is governed by that maxim is not an honest man.
Honesty is the cornerstone of all success, without which confidence and ability to perform shall cease to exist.
Honesty is the first chapter in the book of wisdom.
Honesty is the first chapter of the book of wisdom.
Honesty pays, but it doesn't seem to pay enough to suit some people.
I have done more harm by the falseness of trying to please than by the honesty of trying to hurt.
I have not observed men's honesty to increase with their riches.
If all mankind were suddenly to practice honesty, many thousands of people would be sure to starve.
If honesty did not exist, we ought to invent it as the best means of getting rich.
auther: Honoré Gabriel Riqueti Count of Mirabeau

qoute: It is discouraging how many people are shocked by honesty and how few by deceit.
No legacy is so rich as honesty.
People who are brutally honest get more satisfaction out of the brutality than out of the honesty.
The foundation stones for a balanced success are honesty, character, integrity, faith, love and loyalty.
The secret of life is honesty and fair dealing. If you can fake that, you've got it made.
The secret of life is honesty and fair dealing. If you can fake that, you've got it made.
The true measure of life is not length, but honesty.
To make your children capable of honesty is the beginning of education.
To make your children capable of honesty is the beginning of education.
We must make the world honest before we can honestly say to our children that honesty is the best policy.
With people of limited ability modesty is merely honesty. But with those who possess great talent it is hypocrisy.
